info.name: Eneo AI Integration
info.summary: Integration of Eneo AI platform with Nextcloud Hub
info.description:
This app integrates the Eneo AI platform (generativ AI fÃ¶r offentlig sektor) with Nextcloud Hub.
**Features:**
* **Single Sign-On (SSO)**: Seamless authentication between Nextcloud and Eneo using OAuth2 * **Smart Picker Integration**: Access Eneo AI assistant directly from Text, Talk, Mail, and other Nextcloud apps * **File Context**: Let Eneo AI analyze and answer questions about your Nextcloud files * **Reference Provider**: Preview Eneo conversations and content in Nextcloud * **Privacy-First**: All AI processing happens on your own infrastructure, no external cloud services * **GDPR Compliant**: Full control over data processing and storage
**How to use:**
1. Configure the Eneo API endpoint in admin settings 2. Set up OAuth2 credentials for SSO 3. Use the Smart Picker (/) in any Nextcloud app to access Eneo AI 4. Select files to give Eneo context for better answers
**About Eneo:**
Eneo is an open-source AI platform (AGPL-3.0) developed for Swedish public sector, focusing on: * Local deployment and data sovereignty * Swedish language support * GDPR and AI Act compliance * Democratic and transparent AI usage
Learn more: https://github.com/eneo-ai/eneo
**Ethical AI Rating: ðŸŸ¢**
When using Eneo with local models: * Open source software for training and inference * Models can be run on-premises * Full control over data and algorithms
info.author: Sundsvalls kommun
